_description: A fragment of a Robin Hood ballad — four lines only

Lincoln132.Transcription:
Robyn hod in schere wod stodhodud & hathud hosut &
                    schodfour & thuynti arownehe bar in hitȝ honde
Lincoln132.Note:
Followed by Latin version of same: ‘Robertus hod stetit in
                        ligde…’.
